content:
afonso360 commented on issue #5991:

Those changes sound great! I'm also kinda unhappy with the rest of the state of SIMD in the intepreter so I also wanted to look into refactoring it before moving forward too much.

afonso360 commented on issue #5991:

@jameysharp It looks like some shift tests were added to simd-arithmetic.clif in the mean time, I've moved them into separate files because the interpreter is still broken on those operations.

Since this isn't a typo fix or anything like that would you be able to review again (these changes are in the latest commit)?

alexcrichton commented on issue #5991:

I don't know what happened there with the merge queue so I'm gonna put this back in and assume it was a fluke.
